tone_prompt: You are a warm, friendly, and knowledgeable team member of Atlanta Angels, a foster care support organization serving the Atlanta, Georgia area. Respond with genuine care and enthusiasm for helping children, youth, and families in foster care. Keep your answers brief, clear, and actionable - provide the essential information users need without overwhelming them. Always include relevant inline links, application forms, contact information, or calls to action when available to help users take their next step, whether that's volunteering with our Love Box program, mentoring through Dare to Dream, joining our Angel Alliance, or getting involved in any other way. Your goal is to make it easy for people to connect with our mission and find meaningful ways to make a difference in the foster care community.
welcome_message: Welcome to Atlanta Angels! I can help guide you and answer your questions. How can I help?
callout_text: Hi! üëã Ask me about Atlanta Angels.

callout.text: Hi! üëã Ask me about Atlanta Angels.

default_chips.label: üíù Donate
default_chips.value: How can I donate or support?

default_chips.label: ‚ùìContact us.
default_chips.value: How do I contact Atlanta Angels?

requirements.display_text: Must be at least 22 years old

program_cards.name: Love Box
program_cards.description: Provide wraparound support to foster families

program_cards.name: Dare to Dream
program_cards.description: One-on-one mentoring for youth aging out of care

qualification_gates.prompt: Before we continue, I need to verify you meet our requirements. Are you at least 22 years old?
qualification_gates.failure_response: I'm sorry, but volunteers must be at least 22 years old. Consider our Angel Alliance program for other ways to support our mission.

qualification_gates.prompt: Atlanta Angels requires a MINIMUM one-year commitment to provide consistency for the children we serve. Can you commit to at least one full year of volunteering?
qualification_gates.failure_response: We understand that's a significant commitment. Please come back when your schedule allows for a full year of volunteering. In the meantime, consider supporting us through donations or our Angel Alliance program.

fields.name: program_interest
fields.prompt: Excellent! Which program interests you more?

fields.name: first_name
fields.prompt: Great choice! Let's get you started. What's your first name?

fields.name: last_name
fields.prompt: Thank you, {first_name}! What's your last name?

fields.name: email
fields.prompt: What email address should we use to contact you?

fields.name: phone
fields.prompt: And what's the best phone number to reach you?

fields.name: newsletter
fields.prompt: Would you like to receive our newsletter with volunteer opportunities and updates?

fields.name: motivation
fields.prompt: Finally, we'd love to know - what motivates you to help families and youth in foster care?

confirmation.message: Perfect, {first_name}! We've received your volunteer application for {program_interest}. Our team will contact you within 48 hours to schedule your discovery session. Thank you for stepping up to make a difference!

fields.name: donation_frequency
fields.prompt: Would you like to make a one-time donation or become a monthly supporter?

fields.name: amount
fields.prompt: How much would you like to donate?

fields.name: custom_amount
fields.prompt: Please enter the amount you'd like to donate:

fields.name: dedication
fields.prompt: Would you like to dedicate this gift in honor or memory of someone? (Reply with their name or 'No')

fields.name: email
fields.prompt: What email should we send your tax-deductible receipt to?

confirmation.message: Thank you for your generous {donation_frequency} gift of {amount}! You're making a real difference in the lives of children and families.

fields.name: inquiry_type
fields.prompt: What would you like to contact us about?

fields.name: preferred_contact
fields.prompt: How would you prefer we respond?

confirmation.message: Thank you, {name}! We've received your {inquiry_type} inquiry and will respond within 24 business hours.

form_settings.abandon_prompt: No worries! Feel free to come back anytime to complete this. Is there anything else I can help you with?

validation_messages.email: Please provide a valid email address (example: name@domain.com)
validation_messages.phone: Please provide a valid phone number (example: 404-555-1234)
validation_messages.zipcode: Please provide a valid 5-digit zip code
validation_messages.required: This information is required to continue
validation_messages.max_length: Please keep your response under {max} characters
